name: Red Mantis Collaborator
text: You pass along private details to the Red Mantis, and they protect you in return.
benefit: The Red Mantis can help you hide from trouble in one of their secret safe houses. Anyone attempting Diplomacy or Survival checks to locate you during this time takes a â€“10 penalty, and anyone attempting to scry upon you or magically divine your location must first succeed at a caster level check (DC = 15 + your character level). You can stay in a Mantis safe house for up to 1 day per character level before you are forced to vacate.
